## PersistentCache.clear() method

Deletes all cached entries from disk.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clear({ leaveEmptyDir }?: {
        leaveEmptyDir?: boolean | undefined;
    }): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { leaveEmptyDir } | { leaveEmptyDir?: boolean &#124; undefined; } | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
